name: gpio-buttons
description: GPIO button-listener plugin for Volumio 4 with custom action support
author: tomatpasser, Darmur, Just a Nerd

volumio_info.details: Bookworm version - GPIO button-listener plugin for Volumio 4. Supports standard playback controls plus custom WebSocket emit for plugin integration.
volumio_info.changelog: 1.9.0: Added custom emit action for calling any plugin method via WebSocket. 1.8.5: Fixed socket.io-client version mismatch.
